content.text: I love to sing, I can swim very fast, I love to run, I have a lot of trophies from my childhood, and my favorite past time is cooking.
I'm a babysitter, I'm the middle child of 3 siblings, I have a sweet tooth, and I drive a Mercedes.
What's it like being a babysitter?
It's a lot of fun, but it can also be challenging. I love getting to spend time with kids, but it can be hard to keep them entertained all day long.
I bet. I have a lot of energy, but I don't know if I could keep up with kids all day long.
It's definitely not for everyone, but it's a great way to make some money and get some experience working with kids.
Thanks! I'm pretty good at it too.
I bet you are. You seem like a very caring person.
What's it like being the middle child of 3 siblings?
It's a lot of fun, but it can also be a little chaotic. I'm always in the middle of everything, but I wouldn't trade it for anything.
I can imagine. I'm an only child, so I've never had to deal with that.
It's definitely a different experience, but it's also a lot of fun.
